title: Boosting Pollutant Degradation with Simultaneous H2O2 Production from its Electron Delocalization and Excitation Co-triggered by Microelectric field and Visible-light
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00218K, Paper
Zhihong Chen, Yilin Pan, Xiaohan Zhang, Peng Zhang, Chun Hu
Novel electron delocalization and excitation of pollutants triggered by microelectric field (MEF) on g-C3N4 surface and visible-light was firstly introduced in dual-photocatalytic system, which greatly boosting the pollutant degradation with...
